Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory351.jpg'}
{3: "A few hours ago, in Gray Raven's temporary camp."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Hacking complete. Turns out it's an encrypted comms address.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As Lee continues to work on it, the lengthy non-disclosure agreement has turned into a simple string of numbers and letters.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Shall we connect to this address, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lee nods and connects to the address. After a slight noise, the screen shows no image, but a voice can be heard through the speaker.'}
{2: "Asimov's Voice", 3: "I'll jump to the conclusion. The reason why Lucia was..."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Hmm? That's Asimov. They are talking about Lucia.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The sound quality is not great, but still enough for you to identify the speaker.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Would you like to continue listening to it, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory351.jpg'}
{2: "Nikola's Voice", 3: '...It is worth finding out.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Lee turns off the device when the speaker is no longer making any sound. Three of you remain silent, trying to digest the fact.'}
{2: 'Liv? Can you check if this is a forged recording?', 3: '24'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I already matched the voiceprint and ambient noise halfway through the recording. It wasn't forged...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'What they were talking about... Is it true, Commandant?', 4: '2'}
{2: "At least it's in line with my experience.", 3: '27'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'What do we do now, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "The source of this information is unknown, so the actual conversation won't be disclosed to you later, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'If we confronted the HQ, they would question where we got this information from.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Maybe this recording itself was meant to sow discord among us.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'Get me Commander Nikola.', 3: '34'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Really? He would surely want to find out where you got it from.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: "It's okay. I won't ask any question that's not related to Lucia.", 3: '38'}
{2: 'That will leave some room for explanation.', 3: '40'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I understand. Let me wipe off the wiretapping evidence from the terminal first.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory693.jpg'}
{3: 'Alpha has just opened her eyes when the ground begins to shake violently. All the alarm indicators are screaming like the cries of a dying beast.'}
{3: 'Through the transparent glass, she sees a strange figure standing where Lucia was before.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'â€”CLANG!'}
{3: 'The dagger she hurled went through the glass, only to be blocked by a purple moon umbrella.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The tall, slim female puts away her moon umbrella and picks up the dagger, then gently places it on a desk nearby.'}
{3: 'She takes off her top hat and bows to Alpha gracefully.'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: 'Allow me to apologize again for my inappropriate manner last time.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: "It's my honor to meet you, Ascendant... Or should I call you an agent now?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: "The name's Lilith. I came with good faith.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Lilith puts her hat back on and looks at Alpha with a sincere smile.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: '(This is the same voice I heard before...)', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "You opened the gate of Fort Winter, didn't you?", 4: '1'}
{3: "Before entering Fort Winter, Alpha already sensed the camera's abnormal movement and zooming. She had been guarding against potential enemies."}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: "You could have gone in without my help, couldn't you?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: 'Still, it would be great if I saved you some time there.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'The best lie is half a truth...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'If the Ascendant who said this was here, they had probably already begun their "sincere" talks.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Where did you take her?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: 'She was unconscious due to a M.I.N.D. overload. I left her in a safe location outside Fort Winter.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: "I know you care about her a lot, but I don't want others to disturb us.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Disturb us?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Another loud explosion has sent the entire Fort Winter trembling.'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: "Don't look at me that way. It was Kurono's people. They didn't get to run back to the multi-purpose fighter, but still managed to activate the self-destruction program.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: 'I was so close to stopping them.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'What do you want?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: "As a relatively new Ascendant, isn't it normal for me to admire my powerful predecessor?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: 'May I have the honor to witness your power? That had always been my goal ever since I joined the Ascendants.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'I have no interest in that. Go wag your tail at your master.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: "Too bad he never revealed his power. Besides, I don't want him to see me as an usurper.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: "Don't you want to know where that Construct is?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'You can also tell me her location right now and get lost.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: "I'm afraid I can't. It took me a lot of effort to find this opportunity.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Although surrounded by explosions, they do not seem to panic at all.'}
{3: 'Alpha and Lilith both fall down as the ground underneath begins to collapse.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory690.jpg'}
{3: 'After cutting apart the debris in front, Alpha sees a sea of lava.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lilith', 3: 'This is where those scientists disposed of their failed work.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lilith is sitting on an exposed steel bar, enjoying the majestic view.'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: 'Of course, they were also regarded as failures and thrown into the incinerator in the end.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: "Don't you find it sarcastic? Those who claimed to have controlled the direction of evolution ended up being filtered out.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Alpha', 3: 'How do you know so well?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: 'I had a past similar to yours...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She chuckles.'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: 'Are you really not joining us? We can found an "Association of Project Winter Victims".', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "I'm not interested. Tell me where she is.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: 'Show me how much you can get from me then.', 4: '1'}
